title: 22 Scars
description: Raised with apathy and spite, Amy’s life is a monotonous drone of deep despair, broken only by coffee and nights out with her best—and only—friend. She battles depression daily, fighting to keep her sanity in a world that, to her, is set on destroying her soul.Her future is bleak, overcast with shadow and doubt; her past harbors terrible secrets that even those closest to her couldn’t begin to guess. When tragedy strikes someone she holds dear, will she succumb to the crushing weight of despair, or will she find the strength to fight—to live?22 Scars is a story of what it takes to live daily with depression - and how the scars of a lifetime can pass through generations and beyond.Can the past ever truly be forgotten?Can depression ever be beat?
author: C.M. North
